creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
As per mailing list discussion "About using JavaFX WebEngine":
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/jmeter-dev/201608.mbox/%3CCAH9fUpZUYiHHe8ghL_74NDdmoMZzCUQ0JNVCQ2x6Rw6vTcEGiA%40mail.gmail.com%3E


Note this important thing:
https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8165757?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:all-tabpanel

Created attachment 34258
Patch implementing the feature

Please ensure you upgrade ANT Version to one support Java8, 1.9.7 for example
